title: "FIGUR8 Names Scott Sexton President"
excerpt: "Boston, Massachusetts-based FIGUR8 was founded by Nan-Wei Gong, Ph.D., its current chief executive officer, and Tiegeng Ren, Ph.D., its current chief technology officer. Its wearable technology evaluates musculoskeletal health using a combination of artificial intelligence software and embedded biosensors."
